p: A respirator, on the other hand, consists of four different layers of filters [ 59]. The innermost and outmost layer consists of non-woven PP, which is predominantly hydrophobic, to prevent the moisture from getting absorbed. The middle layers consist of a modacrylic support to provide shape and thickness to the respirator and the non-woven PP layer that captures the unwanted particles. Figure 6 gives the schematic of an N95 mask showing the four layers.
